physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of schoolchildren and three adults. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Most of the chidren are standing up
 except for the ones in the front who are sitting or squatting down. All of them are dressed in the same kind of uniform
 that of a long white outfit. The background of the photograph shows a part of a building
 It is double storey and it has tiled pitched roofs and the second floor has railings around the balcony

All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. Most of the chidren are standing up, except for the ones in the front who are sitting or squatting down. All of them are dressed in the same kind of uniform, that of a long white outfit. The background of the photograph shows a part of a building, It is double storey and it has tiled pitched roofs and the second floor has railings around the balcony
